sentences.sentence: The book was the authority on sexual perversions.

sentences.sentence: The past has been scarred by countless mistrials and perversions of justice.

sentences.sentence: With a twinkle in her eyes, she described in detail one of the most extraordinary perversions I had ever heard.
sentences.translation: 她眼睛发亮，详细描述了我所听到过的最骇世惊俗的反常行为。
